titles.title: How Sweet The Name Of Jesus Sounds

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: How sweet the name of Jesus sounds, newline In a believer's ear; newline It soothes his sorrows, heals his wounds newline And drives away his fear.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: It makes the wounded Spirit whole newline And calms the troubled breast; newline 'Tis manna to the hungry soul newline And to the weary, rest.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Dear name! the Rock on which I build, newline My shield and hiding place; newline My never failing treasure, newline Filled with boundless stores of grace.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Jesus, my Shepherd, Brother, Friend, newline My Prophet, Priest, and King newline My Lord, my Life, my Way, my End, newline Accept the praise I bring.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Weak is the effort of my heart newline And cold my warmest thought; newline But when I see Thee as Thou art, newline I'll praise Thee as I ought.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Till then I would Thy love proclaim newline With ev'ry fleeting breath; newline And may the music of Thy name newline Refresh my soul in death.
